item.title: Rs 18 Lakh Cigarettes Theft Case: Two Arrested in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Jogulamba Gadwal: In a major breakthrough, police have solved a high-value cigarette theft case involving the theft of cartons worth ₹18 lakh from Jayalakshmi Cigarette Agency. On Tuesday, police arrested two suspects Ratan Lal and Jagadish in connection with the case.
During the investigation, officials recovered cigarette cartons valued at ₹15 lakh, two mobile phones, a van allegedly used in the theft, and an iron rod believed to have been used in the break-in.
...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author
